projects.title: Full-Stack E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Modern e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing with Stripe, real-time inventory management, admin dashboard, and responsive design. Deployed on AWS with CI/CD pipeline.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring user registration/login, product catalog with search and filtering, shopping cart functionality, secure payment processing, order management, and admin panel for inventory control. Built with modern web technologies and follows best practices for security and performance.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: WebSocket-based chat application with React frontend and Node.js backend. Features include real-time messaging, private rooms, file sharing, user presence indicators, and message history. Built for scalability with Redis.
projects.longDescription: A modern chat application supporting multiple chat rooms, private messaging, file uploads, emoji support, typing indicators, and online/offline status. Uses Socket.io for real-time communication and Redis for session management and message caching.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive analytics dashboard for business metrics visualization. Built with React, D3.js, and Python backend using FastAPI. Features real-time data processing, custom charts, and automated reporting with export capabilities.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive business intelligence dashboard that connects to multiple data sources, processes large datasets, and presents insights through interactive charts and graphs. Includes data filtering, custom date ranges, and automated report generation with PDF/Excel export.

projects.title: DevCodes - Enterprise Project Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive project management platform designed to streamline development workflows and enhance team collaboration. Eliminates the need for 3+ separate tools by providing unified project tracking, real-time notifications, and intelligent task routing in a single platform.
projects.longDescription: DevCodes solves the problem of fragmented project management tools by delivering a unified platform with real-time capabilities and intelligent automation. Built with Next.js 14 App Router and Supabase, it features WebSocket-based notifications with custom sounds, automatic task delegation, middleware-based security, and mobile-optimized UI. Key capabilities include multi-role invitation system, CSV import/export, project cloning, bulk operations, and client-side pagination. The platform reduces context switching and delivers <100ms notification latency for seamless team collaboration.
highlights: WebSocket-based real-time notifications with custom admin-uploaded sounds
Smart task delegation with automatic assignment to project owners
Middleware-based access control for enhanced security without RLS dependency
Collapsible sections, bulk operations, and section-specific search
Multi-role invitation system with dual notifications (actor + recipient)
CSV import/export, seed data generation, and project cloning
Eliminated need for 3+ separate tools (Jira, Slack, Google Sheets)

projects.title: DevQR - Free QR Code Generator
projects.description: A free, fast, and intuitive QR code generator supporting both static and customizable QR codes. Generate professional QR codes with custom colors, logos, and branding in seconds. Perfect for marketing, product packaging, and digital campaigns.
projects.longDescription: DevQR provides a seamless experience for generating high-quality QR codes with extensive customization options. Users can create static QR codes instantly or design branded, customizable QR codes with custom colors, patterns, and embedded logos. The platform features real-time preview, multiple export formats, and an intuitive interface suitable for businesses, marketers, and individual users. Built for performance and accessibility, DevQR generates error-corrected QR codes following international standards with support for various data types including URLs, text, contact information, and more.
highlights: Free static and customizable QR code generation
Custom colors, patterns, and logo embedding
No sign-up required for basic features

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Modern weather application built with React and TypeScript. Features current weather, 7-day forecasts, location-based weather, weather maps, and severe weather alerts. Uses OpenWeatherMap API with beautiful UI animations.
projects.longDescription: A responsive weather application providing accurate weather information with location detection, search functionality, favorite locations, weather maps, and detailed forecasts. Features smooth animations and works offline with cached data.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark theme, smooth animations with Framer Motion, SEO optimization, and contact form integration.
projects.longDescription: A professional portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience. Built with performance in mind, featuring server-side rendering, optimized images, perfect Lighthouse scores, and comprehensive SEO for ranking as top software developer in Nepal.
